meta.hint:
Use who to ask about a person. Example - Who saw the bird first?
Use what to ask about a thing. Example - What do birds eat?
Use when to ask about a time. Example - When do birds sleep?
Use where to ask about a place. Example - Where is the bird's nest?
Use why to ask for a reason. Example - Why do birds sing?
meta.question: Complete the sentence with the best question word?
